# On-Call Rotation

## Primary On-Call
- Week 1: Alice (@alice) - Auth team
- Week 2: Bob (@bob) - Core team
- Week 3: Charlie (@charlie) - Platform team
- Week 4: Diana (@diana) - Infra team

## Escalation Path
1. Primary On-Call
2. Team Lead
3. Engineering Manager
4. CTO (critical only)

- [Authentication Issues](./runbooks/auth-issues.md)
